trans-unit.source: Represents a standard Windows vertical scroll bar.
trans-unit.target: 表示标准的 Windows 垂直滚动条。

trans-unit.source: Most controls that need scroll bars already provide them and do not require this control.
trans-unit.target: 需要已滚动条的大多数控件提供它们，并且不需要此控件。

trans-unit.source: This is true of a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> control, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>, and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>, for example.
trans-unit.target: 这是 true 的多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>控件， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>，和一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>，例如。

trans-unit.source: You can use this control to implement scrolling in containers that do not provide their own scroll bars such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox> or for user input of numeric data.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此控件以实现在容器，如未提供其自己的滚动条中滚动<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox>或为数字数据的用户输入。

trans-unit.source: The numeric data can be displayed in a control or used in code.
trans-unit.target: 可以在控件中显示或在代码中使用的数值数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A> properties determine the range of values the user can select.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.Maximum%2A>属性确定用户可以选择的值的范围。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A> property determines the effect of clicking within the scroll bar but outside the scroll box.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.LargeChange%2A>属性确定单击滚动条中但在滚动框之外的效果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A> property determines the effect of clicking the scroll arrows at each end of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar.SmallChange%2A>属性确定单击控件的每一端的滚动箭头的效果。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates and initializes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> and adds it to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例创建并初始化<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>和将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 获取创建控件句柄时所需要的创建参数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" />，包含创建控件的句柄时所需的创建参数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
The default <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the control.
Gets a value indicating whether control's elements are aligned to support locales using right-to-left fonts.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否将控件的元素对齐以支持使用从右向左的字体的区域设置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar.RightToLeft%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> control cannot be set.
Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar.RightToLeft" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar.RightToLeft" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar.RightToLeft%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> control cannot be set, so the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar> never raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar.RightToLeftChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar.RightToLeft%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>控件不能设置，因此<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar>永远不会引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VScrollBar.RightToLeftChanged>事件。
